name: Decontamination Works checklist
Containment of work complete
Corvex have installed mould remediation plant - HEPA Filtration
Remediation process - Non-porous materials should be cleaned using the 'sandwich technique'. Confirm completed
Remediation process - Semi-porous and porous materials should be removed at least 300mm beyond visibly affected sections. Confirm completed
Is waste material being suitably bagged and removed from the work area as per Greencap Scope of Works - attach Greencap signature below
Inspection - Interim evaluations (PRE) to be completed by Greencap - attach Greencap signature below
Inspection - Post-Remediation Verification to be completed by Greencap. Greencap to confirm results have passed - attach Greencap signature below
Are antimicrobial treatment required in these works?
If required, antimicrobial treatment complete
Have Delta completed their decontamination works in the area highlighted by this ITP? - attach Greencap signature below
Strip Out Works checklist
Services Isolation Complete for this section of works
Protection of remaining items
Non-friable Asbestos Removal Complete
Friable Asbestos Removal Complete
Defit Tenancy - Removal of all joinery, doors, furniture, partitions
Is there reason to believe there are load bearing elements?
Walls - Remove to correct height as outlined by scope/BuildCorp
Ceilings - Greencap to mark out extent of mould. Confirm removed by Delta with before and after photos.
Only if timber - Take photo, inform BuildCorp, gain approval to remove - attach BuildCorp signature below
Walls - Are the studs timber or steel?
Specify if 'other'
Shopfront - Greencap/BuildCorp to confirm extent of demolition. Take photo to confirm marking of extent - attach BuildCorp signature below
Flooring - Are the floors timber or tiles? Timber flooring can be removed with a photo taken upon completion - attach BuildCorp signature below
Specify if 'other'
Only if tiles - Take photo, inform BuildCorp, gain approval to remove/leave.
Removal of subfloor services. Concrete scanning to be completed before sawcutting - attach Delta signature below
Service in Floor - Greencap to confirm if conduit is to be removed - attach Greencap signature below
